TITLE: Episode 96 - Practical Preparedness
DESCRIPTION: The Vixens sit down with The Preparedness Guy during National Preparedness Month (who knew?!) to discuss the basics of preparing your home and family for everything from simple disruptions all the way to a zombie apocalypse. Getting prepared doesn't have to be a scary thing. In fact, it will likely reduce stress and make you a better person. You'll enjoy this one.
